title: Confederation of the Greens
text: The Confederation of the Greens (), frequently referred to as simply <a href="The%20Greens%E2%80%93Ecologist%20Confederation%20of%20Catalonia">The Greens</a> (, LV), is a <a href="Green%20politics">green</a> political party in Spain. Since 2011, 13 out of 16 of their member parties belong to <a href="Equo">Equo</a>; for this reason, on 13 May 2012, the <a href="European%20Green%20Party">European Green Party</a> decided to withdraw the Confederation of the Greens membership.
